displayProperties.description: As a Void subclass, collect Captured Void Energy from defeated Hive combatants.

displaySource: "Ikora said she needed a Void Guardian to handle a 'Hive problem.' Does that make you all the best at sword logic? No one's been able to explain sword logic to me in a way that's satisfying. For example, Shaxx fears me, but not because I'm stronger than him. How does sword logic account for that?" â€”Eva Levante
